name: StyleSheet
description: An object implementing the StyleSheet interface represents a single style sheet. CSS style sheets will further implement the more specialized CSSStyleSheet interface.

refs.name: CSS Object Model (CSSOM)
refs.description: The definition of 'StyleSheet' in CSS Object Model (CSSOM).

refs.description: The definition of 'StyleSheet' in Document Object Model (DOM) Level 2 Style Specification.
